name: Premières Démarque
description:
Context :

This game was made during a game jam the Game dev party in lyon. It was a team of seven people three programmers two artists on game designer and one musician.

Gameplay :

Make place while I drive my trolley away !!! 

Arrow Key to move.

Be careful to other people in the shop they will try to kill you if you try to push them. They become even more dangerous when a cashier is open ! 

If you gain enough speed you can enter in a mayhem mode where you can crush people with your trolley.
